name: Yunhong Wang 0001
content: index Prof.Yunhong Wang Brief Biography Email: yhwang@buaa.edu.cn Yunhong Wang is a Professor at the School of Computer Science and Engineering, Beihang University. She has been awarded IEEE Fellow for her contributions to iris recognition and face recognition, and has been awarded IAPR Fellow for her contributions to pattern recognition and biometrics. Prof. Wang has been engaged in research in the fields of pattern recognition and computer vision for years. Her papers published on top journals and conferences have been cited more than 15,000 times according to Google Scholar. She served on the editorial board of IEEE Transactions on Information Forensics and Security, and is now an editorial board member of IEEE Transactions on Biometrics, Behavior, and Identity Sciences, and the journal Pattern Recognition. She also served as the Track Chair of the 25th International Conference on Pattern Recognition (ICPR 2020), Area Chair of the 2021 IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR 2021) and the 2021 International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV 2021), and General Chair of the 2021 International Joint Conference on Biometrics (IJCB 2021).
